EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify dealer about approval of the enrollment
EmailTemplate.name: Program Enrollment Approved Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Enrollment approved for {!Program_Enrollment__c.Program__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Program_Enrollment__c.Primary_Dealership_Contact__c},
ACV is happy to inform you that your enrollment in {!Program_Enrollment__c.Program__c} is approved.
Thanks, ACV Admin
